about_the_game:
·the world of unknown
Exploring unknown worlds that humans cannot go to leads to joy and a sense of accomplishment.
An overwhelming threat never seen before awaits players.

・Realistic play
The battle is similar to the real one.
If you do not wear a diving suit or space suit on the underwater map and space map, your life will decrease.

・Post-apocalyptic
This is a story about humans gaining power from light and fighting against void life forms in order to prevent the end of the Earth.
You start out as a human and explore infected areas on Earth. Furthermore, the story unfolds of gaining transcendent power (awakening), crossing time, and colliding with the void.

・Game control elements
Seiden is a game where you clear the game by controlling and identifying enemies (skills appropriate for the situation) rather than continuously hunting to become stronger.

・Game description and operation
Seiden has 200 unique monsters, 35 backgrounds, and 70 user skills.
Monsters have 500 to 600 skills.

Movement: WASD
Skill:12345 + Right
Attack: left

・Xbox control support
Character name creation and some functions are limited, but all controls necessary for battle are available (including help).

・Detailed story
In the beginning, before life was born in the universe, light and darkness existed.
The light spread brightly throughout the universe, and a void was created in the dark void that the light could not fill.
The void spread as fast as light, and a major collision occurred between light and void.
The massive energy resulting from the collision created another world in light and void, and spread throughout the universe, creating numerous stars, planets, and life forms.

As endless time passes, about 5 billion years ago, a planet called Earth is about to be created.
In the beginning, void life forms came to turn the Earth into a void, and to prevent this, light opposed the void.

New York city and 5-dimensional space in 2030. (Tesseract)
Humans end up in the Tesseract by chance. After learning about what happened in the past, he longs for the power to face the void...

name: SEIDEN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 60" is guaranteed and selected under the graphic settings by default when the game is launched for the first time.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-Bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 60" is guaranteed and selected under the graphic settings by default when the game is launched for the first time.

short_description: A sci-fi RPG adventure. Start in modern times and explore infected areas on Earth. Travel back in time and annihilate the void. Numerous monsters and dungeons await you.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil
